name: Good Robot (itch)
description:
A one week jam done for the community game jam

Theme : "The game is a liar"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game description:

 Switch the level rules from true to false to help your bot reach the goal !

Controls:

As simple as clicking your mouse.

Credits:

Art - Galit "shoze" Weisberg

Programming - Max Himmel  |  Ulysse Raillon

Sound - Rob Neubauer

Font: Gameplay

Pro tips : Click on pause when the level start if you need more time to read the rules
